channel.title: CVE Feed for PowerDNS -- PowerDNS Authoritative Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PowerDNS -- PowerDNS Authoritative Server

item.title: CVE-2015-5230|2024-08-06T06:41:08.428Z -- powerdns -- powerdns%20authoritative%20server
item.description: The DNS packet parsing/generation code in PowerDNS (aka pdns) Authoritative Server 3.4.x before 3.4.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) via crafted query packets.
